page.title: 12MY DAY by ALEX HOWARD.
page.content: MY DAY STARTS WHEN I GET UP AND GO TO SCHOOL.WHEN THE WHISTLE BLOWS I GO TO MY CLASSROOM AND IF IT IS MONDAY I PUT MY DINNER MONEY INTO THE TIN.WE GO DOWN TO THE HALL FOR ASSEMBLY AND MORNING PRAYERS.WHEN THAT IS OVER WE GO CLASS AND WORK.EVERY DAY WE HAVE ENGLISH AND MATHS.ONCE A WEEK WE HAVE P.E. AND GAMES,AND EVERY MONDAY WE GO SWIMMING.AT 10.40 WE HAVE OUR MILK THEN PLAY OUTSIDE.WE COME BACK IN AT 11.00.DINNER IS AT 12.00 THEN AFTERNOON SCHOOL LASTS UNTIL 3.30 THEN WE GO HOME. AT NIGHT I PLAY OUT WITH MY FRIENDS. I PLAY IN MY BACK GARDEN.LATER I GO IN AND WATCH T.V. AT ABOUT 10.30 I GO TO BED.
